title: #356: Down By The River (@ComedianRonT @SteveSimeone)
itunes:title: Down By The River with Ron Taylor and Steve Simeone
description: Ron Taylor had a long talk with myself and Steve Simeone about his time living in a van. He used to park it outside the Comedy Store. He'd take chicks there. He'd do horrible bowelly things in there. He'd even cook there. Jesus. What comics will do to survive. This was a really fun one!
